title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi 4, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, push, create, list, copy, delete, show, ps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama (Node & browser).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain LLM & embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with fluent builder APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators & embedders.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server containerized.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into channels or DMs.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin to query local Ollama models from within your notes.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin for AI autocomplete & summarization via Ollama.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama server and common models for reproducible deployments.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async HTTP client for Ollama API with Tokio.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with HTTP client and JSON parsing.
